verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, understanding \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1732"\w* Core.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* hart panteth \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* fountains \w of|strong="H3068"\w* water; so \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul panteth \w after|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath thirsted \w after|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* strong \w living|strong="H5315"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w when|strong="H2421"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* come \w and|strong="H3068"\w* appear before \w the|strong="H5414"\w* face \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* tears \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* bread day \w and|strong="H3068"\w* night, whilst \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* daily: \w Where|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3068"\w*?

These things \w I|strong="H0589"\w* remembered, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* poured out \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* go \w over|strong="H3068"\w* into \w the|strong="H0559"\w* place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* wonderful tabernacle, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*; \w the|strong="H0559"\w* noise \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* feasting.

Why art thou sad, \w O|strong="H4970"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* soul? \w and|strong="H4191"\w* why dost thou \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*? Hope \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*, \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w still|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H0006"\w* praise \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* countenance,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* God. \w My|strong="H7200"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3820"\w* troubled \w within|strong="H0935"\w* \w myself|strong="H3820"\w*: therefore \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* remember thee \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* land \w of|strong="H3820"\w* Jordan \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Hermoniim, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* little hill.

Deep calleth \w on|strong="H5921"\w* deep, \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* noise \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy flood-gates. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* thy heights \w and|strong="H3605"\w* thy billows \w have|strong="H3605"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* daytime \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord hath commanded \w his|strong="H0834"\w* mercy; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* canticle \w to|strong="H1697"\w* him \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* night. \w With|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* life.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* say \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God: Thou art \w my|strong="H5921"\w* support. \w Why|strong="H0834"\w* hast thou forgotten \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w why|strong="H0834"\w* go \w I|strong="H0834"\w* mourning, whilst \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemy afflicteth \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

Whilst \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H1992"\w* broken, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w me|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* reproached \w me|strong="H0859"\w*; Whilst \w they|strong="H1992"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w* day \w be|strong="H3068"\w* day: Where \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H3588"\w* art thou cast \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul? \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w why|strong="H3588"\w* dost thou disquiet \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? Hope thou \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* still \w give|strong="H7321"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* countenance, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.
